name: B1TTERSW33T L0V3 (WIP)
description:
this game is still in development!!!! so like don't be surprised if things just seem weird or whatever lol (version where Nelly talks normally will be coming soon after game's release YEAHHH)

WARNINGS: "howdy!! this is the creator, Charlie! uhhh this is mostly an experimental & bittersweet kinda game where i'll explore some topics and mess around with different mechanics and whatever. i just wanted to say that this will talk about some heavy topics (nothing too serious); body horror / blood / meat (although the art style is very simplistic); some vent type stuff, slight mentions of drugs, & some bright colors!! so, if you are uncomfortable with any of that or just don't enjoy any of it at all, then feel free to exit the game :-) that's all!! anyway, enjoy the game!!"

controls: wasd/arrow keys on computer laptop & you slide where you want to go on mobile! (you run into the things you wanna interact with!!)

CREDITS:

sprites, (some) characters, etc etc. made by me!

some character ideas were made by neo, zeph and sparky (heart lady, sun guy, fire guy)

maverick/maverick's room made by sparky!! (they also helped me with the color palettes lol)

made with bitsy color! by aury system!
